topic.title: ZeroTalk + Linux + Tor Error
topic.body:
$ python zeronet.py &
Starting ZeroNet...
...
TorManager Tor controller connect error: [Errno 111] Connection refused
...
Ui.UiServer Web interface: http://127.0.0.1:43110/
...

I see into gedit src/Tor/TorManager.py and see
....
self.tor_exe = "tools/tor/tor.exe"
....
But there isnt a tor.exe in Linux... Is that a Bug?

topic.title: PLAY no me convence, Torrents en Clearnet
topic.body:
Play puede ser un buen sitio (alternativo a TPB) y resistente a ataques de los defensores del Copyright. 

El problema viene por el lado de los usuarios... si descargamos esos Torrents estaremos igual de indefensos ante ataques de esos idiotas.

La unica forma de descargar Torrents de forma anonima y privada es usando I2P.

topic.title: Zeronet en crisis?
topic.body:
Ya hay opiniones que hablan de la lenta muerte de Zeronet porque los usuarios no encuentran lo que andan buscando.

En mi opinion, la sobrevivencia de ZN no depende en exclusiva de esos pocos usuarios, que tienen internalizada la cultura de ser simplemente clientes y que no son capaces de crear contenidos; sino del exito en crear espacios para el desarrollo.

Continua en http://127.0.0.1:43110/procesos.bit/?Post:88

topic.title: Feed RSS and Zeronet
topic.body: Do you know an app or plugin for Zeronet to public news from other websites?

1_1GHF28rHoAH3fBV1W9sHwWBxNAur9RGXD5.body: Saludos desde la darknet I2P http://geti2p.net ... no solo privacidad, sino anonimo :-)

1_1JHQA9oFkFpFFRiscyT4N71AKLWg46pQ92.body:
I found the Answer...

No, I downloaded the Linux version, but both have very similar code.

The solution is:

$ cd ~/directory/from/ZeroNet/
$ proxychains tor -f tools/tor/torrc &
$ python zeronet.py --tor always &

I dont want to use the default port of Tor, then I use ProxyChains to change it (force).

Hopelly, ZeroNet will have support for I2P in the nearly futur!

2_1JHQA9oFkFpFFRiscyT4N71AKLWg46pQ92.body: Ni tribler, ni Deluge, ni una VPN te salvaran si descargas Torrents usando Trackers Abiertos (como PLAY o TPB)... solo usando trackers dentro de Tor (p.e. trackers.onion) o en I2P se puede ser anonimo.

4_1JHQA9oFkFpFFRiscyT4N71AKLWg46pQ92.body:
> [pycole](#comment_80_1KwTTgPRSTHFmmJAFBt6kQfdyNeSM5KJuH): Full I2p support seems to be planned, but there are some kinks to work out first (see the Github page).In the meantime, BOB (the Basic open Bridge) may be of use: It lets non i2p-aware applications communicate over i2p. That's probably not ideal (and might be too demanding on i2p's network), but nobody seems to have the 'best' way to do this just yet.

Do you have any idea (tutorial) to configure Zeronet with BOB for I2P?
